column4: Help! Used dd to transfer everything from my 5.5GB partition on old HD to new 18GB partition on new HD but now when on the new HD some applications still read 5.5GB, nothing has recognized the growth, apart from fdisk, etc?
... df <enter> shows free / used space on all mounted devices
- use df -h  ... if you want units in Mb rather than blocks
Gparted says 73% used, but has the sizes right. Meaning it's just filled 73% with supposedly nothing.
- where is the new 18gb drive? hdb1?
hda1, the one that, for some stupid reason, still reads 5.5GB
- that does not match what df shows
Something, somewhere makes it think it's on the old HD. ONLY THE NEW 20GB HD IS IN.
- can you jumber and cable to run both at once?
